items.title: Explainable Galaxy Interaction Prediction with Hybrid Attention Mechanisms
items.summary: arXiv:2601.08872v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: Galaxy interaction classification remains challenging due to complex morphological patterns and the limited interpretability of deep learning models. We propose an attentive neural ensemble that combines AG-XCaps, H-SNN, and ResNet-…

items.title: Planet-Host Stars Across the Galaxy in the 2040s
items.summary: arXiv:2601.08890v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: By the 2040s, the exoplanet field will have moved from the discovery of a few thousand planets to hundreds of thousands, thanks to Gaia DR5, TESS, PLATO, Roman, and their successors. At that stage, the key bottleneck will no longer…
